import React, { Fragment, useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import Breadcrumb from '../common/breadcrumb'; import LearningFilter from './learning-filter'; import learningOne from '../../assets/images/faq/learning-1.png'; import four from '../../assets/images/blog/4.jpg'; import learningDB from '../../data/learning/learningDB'; const LearningDeatil = (props) => { const location = props.location const id = location.state ? location.state.id : 1 const [singleData, setSingleData] = useState(''); useEffect(() => { learningDB.filter((data) => { if (data.Id === id) { setSingleData(data) } return 0; }) }, [id]); return (
  • {singleData.date}
  • John Deo
  • {singleData.hits}Hits
  • {singleData.comments} Comments

{singleData.des1}

Comment

  • {singleData.student_name} ( {singleData.student_designation} )
    • {singleData.hits} Hits
    • {singleData.comments} Comments

    {singleData.student_comment}

    • {singleData.writer_name} ( {singleData.student_designation} )

      {singleData.writer_reply}

  • John Deo ( Designer )
    • 12 Hits
    • 328 Comments

    There are many variations of passages of Lorem Ipsum available, but the majority have suffered alteration in some form, by injected humour, or randomised words which don't look even slightly believable. If you are going to use a passage of Lorem Ipsum, you need to be sure there isn't anything embarrassing hidden in the middle of text.

 ); }; export default LearningDeatil;
